Description: Ostracon, small fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, both the interior and exterior are very worn, the interior is partially covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior bears slight traces of a black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394345) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394345)
